# we-modal



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                         | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `isVisible` | `is-visible` | identify if modal is visible or not | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event           | Description                                         | Type               |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `modalCallback` | Event triggered when the visibility of modal change | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                      | Description                                                                                                        |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--align-items`           | Align items of modal, it affects the vertical position of the elements inside the modal <br> Default: unset        |
| `--back--align-items`     | Align items of back of modal, it affects the vertical position of modal in the page <br> Default: center           |
| `--back--background`      | Background of back of modal <br> Default: rgba(128, 128, 128, 0.35)                                                |
| `--back--justify-content` | Justify content of back of modal, it affects the horizontal position of modal in the page <br> Default: center     |
| `--background`            | Background of modal <br> Default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)                                                           |
| `--border`                | Border of modal <br> Default: none                                                                                 |
| `--border-radius`         | Border radius of modal <br> Default: 0.625em                                                                       |
| `--display`               | Display option of modal <br> Default: flex                                                                         |
| `--height`                | Height of modal <br> Default: 18.750em                                                                             |
| `--justify-content`       | Justify content of modal, it affects the horizontal position of the elements inside the modal <br> Default: center |
| `--padding`               | Padding of modal <br> Default: 0.625em                                                                             |
| `--width`                 | Width of modal <br> Default: 12.500em                                                                              |
